title: Governance - Banijay Group
snippet: Banijay Group's governance is provided by an 11-person board of directors, including five women. It combines non-executive roles with day-to-day management.

title: Banijay Entertainment - Wikipedia
snippet: Banijay Entertainment was formed ... then internationally under the leadership of Stéphane Courbit (who was previously the CEO of Endemol France) alongside Groupe Arnault, the Agnelli and De Agostini families and AMS Industries....

title: Banijay Group is a leader in the entertainment business
snippet: If the Content production & distribution was the cornerstone of Banijay Group, the acquisition of a stake in Betclic and the creation of Banijay with world class partners such as Groupe Arnault, De Agostini and Exor was the beginning of a new movement.
